name: The Adventure Of Moon Man
description:
Alien attack the moon, they try to destroy it. The protector of the moon man tries to defeat the aliens and protect the moon. Be careful because the enemy is everywhere. Play the game and enjoy it

Control description:
  Go upper : W/ up arrow
  Go down : S/ down arrow
  Go left : A/left arrow
  Go right : D/right arrow
shoot click "left mouse button"

screen resolution: 1600 x 900
